html: Hear ye/see ye, but they understand not. The prophecy was partially fulfilled by the wicked Jews in Jesus' day ( Matt. 13:13-15; John 12:37-41; Acts 28:25-28) and has general fulfillment in all those who are so spiritually deaf and blind that they will not understand or accept the words of God given through the prophets. The terms hear and see refer to physical faculties (eyes and ears) and symbolize spiritual faculties such as understanding and perceptiveness.
